Articles.Content:
I have in my account: KSP, KSP Making History, and KSP Breaking ground

Which version do i download for all?  or do i do that separately?  Thanks!

The current versions of each should be at the top of the list of whatever site you're getting them from. You download and install KSP, then download the expansions into the GameData folder of the game install.
If you got the game from Steam, it will download all of the most recent versions when you click "install" or "play".

The two DLCs could be in just one version. So, don't panic that you'll be downloading several updates. 

Did this solve thy problem?

Thanks for the responses!  My game source was program website (original subscription from day 1).    It appears I had to download each expansion.  Wasn't too hard, I just wasn't sure if they were rolled into one or separate.  Thanks !

 

Safe travels!
